entry.title: Monday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
